title: Roasted Cauliflower with Parsley, Garlic, and Lemon Juice
ingredients: 1large head cauliflower, cored and broken into 2-inch (5 cm) florets
directions: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Toss the cauliflower with the oil and salt in a large bowl. Arrange on the prepared baking sheet in one layer and roast until the florets are tender and the tips are golden brown, about 30 minutes.

While the cauliflower is still hot, pile it into a bowl and toss with the garlic, parsley, and lemon juice (start with a small amount of juice and add more until you love the level of tanginess). Serve hot or at room temperature.
